ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package bulk pork breakfast sausage
1 (16 ounce) package processed cheese food, cubed
1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained

cookingTips: Brown and crumble sausage, then drain excess fat before adding other ingredients
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker on low for 1-2 hours, stirring occasionally until cheese melts
Serve warm with tortilla chips and maintain on warm setting during a party
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I keep this queso from breaking down or becoming oily if I need to keep it warm?
